;When the leaves start to fall off the trees in autumn, you probably should use a leaf blower instead of a rake. You need to put in a lot of time and effort to not only rake the leaves but to also stick them in a bag and place them on the curb. To save wear and tear on your back from all of the bending over, you'll want to just find a leaf blower that will certainly do it for you. One preferred brand of leaf blowers is Husqvarna and one of their widely known designs is the Husqvarna 125BVx 28cc 2-Cycle Gas Powered 170 MPH Blower/Vac With Smart Start.
;
;Apart from leaf blowers, Husqvarna produces additional lawn and gardening tools like mowers and chainsaws to help with making your job easier. If you require a handheld blower, then the Husqvarna 125BVx will offer you a blend of ergonomic design and high power. The layout of the blower has the blower tube in the direct line of the handle to help minimize rotational force on the wrist. This blower is great for the householder, with its Vac-Kit for mulching and vacuuming your grass debris, plus a flare nozzle. The 125BVx garden blower boasts a two year warranty on parts and labor and in addition it received Best Buy's seal of approval.
;
;You are able to start the blower with little effort because it has Husqvarna Smart Start system which lowers the resistance in the starter cord. Furthermore, it has an adjustable soft grip handle and an easy-to-use control layout. It starts a lot easier because of an air purge function, which removes air from both the fuel system and carburetor. Furthermore, it comes with capabilities to perform as a lawn vacuum, and has a vac bag. Collecting debris is certainly a breeze since it has mulching knives to reduce the debris size.
;
